summary: Frontend SEO testing completed for 7 new service pages with FAQs. All pages load correctly and display FAQ sections visually. CRITICAL BUG: FAQPage Schema markup is NOT being rendered in HTML on any page - the Helmet component for FAQPage is being ignored/overwritten.

seo_bugs.issue: FAQPage Schema NOT rendered in HTML
seo_bugs.details: The FAQPage schema is defined in a separate <Helmet> component but is not being output to HTML. Only LocalBusiness/Service schemas are rendered. This means search engines won't recognize FAQ structured data.
seo_bugs.root_cause: Multiple Helmet components with <script type='application/ld+json'> - react-helmet-async appears to be deduplicating or overwriting the FAQPage schema
seo_bugs.suggested_fix: Combine FAQPage schema into SchemaMarkup component or use a single Helmet with array of schemas

action_items: FIX CRITICAL: FAQPage Schema not rendering - modify SchemaMarkup component to accept FAQPage data or combine schemas into single Helmet
Verify FAQPage schema appears in HTML after fix using: curl -s 'URL' | grep 'FAQPage'
critical_code_review_comments: FAQPage schema in separate Helmet component (lines 58-74 in GarageFloorCoating.jsx) is not being rendered - react-helmet-async deduplication issue
SchemaMarkup component already supports FAQPage type (lines 106-115) but pages are not using it correctly

success_rate.frontend: 85% - Visual FAQs work, Schema markup broken

context_for_next_testing_agent: All 7 service pages load correctly with visual FAQ sections, Service Areas, Related Services, and Why EpoxyArt33 sections. The CRITICAL issue is FAQPage Schema not rendering in HTML - needs fix in how schemas are combined.

tests_executed.details: H1: 'Garage Floor Coating Naples FL', FAQ section visible, Service Areas visible, Related Services visible
H1: 'Pool Deck Resurfacing Naples FL', FAQ section visible, Service Areas visible, Related Services visible
H1: 'Industrial Epoxy Heavy-Duty Flooring', FAQ section visible, Related Services visible
H1: 'Concrete Repair & Moisture Mitigation Naples FL', FAQ section visible, Service Areas visible
H1: 'Driveway Resurfacing', FAQ section visible, Service Areas visible, Why EpoxyArt33 visible
H1: 'Waterproofing TREMCO 350/351 System', FAQ section visible, Service Areas visible, Related Services visible
H1: 'Epoxy Flooring Naples FL', FAQ section visible, Naples Neighborhoods visible, Services section visible
FAQPage schema NOT found in HTML on any of the 7 pages. Only LocalBusiness/Service schemas rendered.
